Package com.what2see.service.user

Class UserService<T extends User>

java.lang.Object
com.what2see.service.user.UserService<T>
Type Parameters:
T - type of the User subclass (including User itself)
Direct Known Subclasses:
AdministratorService, GuideService, TouristService, UserServiceImpl
public abstract class UserService<T extends User> extends Object
Implementation of the Factory Method design pattern.
Service class that handles the common business logic for all User subclasses, independently of their concrete type. It is used for typing purposes only and can't be injected directly.
Note that, in practice at the current state of code, the concrete repository is just a restriction of the pool of User on which the methods are applied.

  • Method Details

    • getRepository

      public abstract UserRepository<T> getRepository()
      Returns the concrete instance of the UserRepository interface for User entities. This is the only method that needs to be implemented by the subclasses.
      Returns:
      repository instance

    • findAll

      public List<T> findAll()
      Returns all User entities of type UserService.
      Returns:
      list of all entities

    • register

      public T register(T user) throws org.springframework.dao.DataIntegrityViolationException
      Registers a new User entity of type UserService.
      The username is normalized to lowercase and trimmed.
      The first and last name are trimmed.
      The password is hashed.
      Parameters:
      user - entity to be registered
      Returns:
      registered entity
      Throws:
      org.springframework.dao.DataIntegrityViolationException - if the username is already taken
      See Also:
      • PasswordManager.hashPassword(String)

    • login

      public T login(UserLoginDTO login)
      Authenticates a User entity of type UserService.
      The username is normalized to lowercase and trimmed.
      The password is hashed.
      Parameters:
      login - credentials to be authenticated
      Returns:
      authenticated entity or null if the credentials are invalid

    • findById

      public T findById(Long userId)
      Finds a User entity of type UserService by its id.
      Parameters:
      userId - id of the entity to be found
      Returns:
      found entity
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - if the entity is not found

    • normalize

      private String normalize(String s)
      Normalizes a string to lowercase and trims it.
      Parameters:
      s - string to be normalized
      Returns:
      normalized string
